content.question: A satellite in space uses a receiver to record a rocket being launched from Earthâ€™s surface. Which of the following correctly predicts what the receiver will measure as the rocket is launched?

choices.label: The receiver will measure only sound waves from the rocket.
The receiver will measure only the light waves from the rocket.
The receiver will measure both the sound waves and the light waves from the rocket.
The receiver will not measure the sound waves or the light waves.

content.answer: The receiver will measure only the light waves from the rocket.
